name: Spaceboom Demo
description:
You are a rookie pilot called to complete a series of maps designed to destroy you. On top of that you will have to succeed in 3 objectives in each map, in order to be awarded with tokens and medals used to upgrade your ship.

Maps are usually small but will require multiple runs to complete all objectives. You will have to find the optimal set of moves in order to beat the clock.

There is also a local 2 player PVP mode to test your skills against another pilot.

This is a demo version of the game for testing and feedback purposes.
